message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SOC, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the problem of detecting offensive language and hate speech on social media platforms, which is a common topic in the field of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms to classify and analyze text data, which falls under the sub-category of social and information retrieval (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper deals with issues related to cyberbullying and social media behavior, which could be classified under the sub-categories of cyber security (cs.CY) and social computing (cs.SOC). Finally, the paper involves the development of automatic classification systems, which could be classified under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG).
